verses.content: Ni khat chu Pathien naupahai chu LALPA hmaa an hung inlang- na ni a um nâwk a, Setan khawm chu anni laia LALPA hmaa inlang dingin a hung veh a.
LALPA chun Setan kuoma chun, “Nang khâwtienga inthawka hung am i na?” a ta. Setan chun LALPA chu a dawn a, “Hnuoia kân vâk vêlnaa le chutaka a suk a tunga inlawnnaa inthawkin,” a ta.

LALPA chun Setan kuoma chun, “Ka siehlaw Job hi i ngaituo hlak am? Hnuoi chunga hin ama anga mi fel le mi tluong, Pathien ṭi mi le suol nghat- san mi an um si nawh a; a san nei loa ama sukbohmang dinga a chungah i mîn chângtir khawma ama chun a ringumna chu a chel det tlat a nih,” a tih a.
Setan chun LALPA chu a dawn a, “Vun aiah vun; anih, miin a thil nei po po chu a hringna dingin a pêk phal âwm hrim a nih.
Tuhin i kut inlet la, a ru le taksa chu tâwk la, i hmâisanah hrilse ngei ngei a ti che,” a ta.
LALPA chun Setan kuomah, “Ngai ta, ama chu i kuta um a nih annâwm; a hringna chau chu hla la,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Setan chu LALPA hmâihmaa inthawk chun a fe suok tah a, Job chu a kephaa inthawka a lusîp chenin khuoihli pânnain a hrem tah a.
Ama chun ama le ama ân huotna dingin bekawihâr a lâk a; vut lai chun a ṭhung tah a.
Chun, a nuhmei chun a kuomah, “I ringumna chu i la chel det tlat el a ni maw? Pathien chu hrilse la, thi el rawh,” a ta.

Nisienlakhawm, ama chun a kuomah, “Nuhmei invêt thuhril angin thu i hril a nih. Iengdingin am Pathien kuta inthawka thil ṭha ei hmu chun, thil ṭha naw khawm ei hmu naw ding am a nih?” a ta. Hieng thilhai po poa khawm hin Job chun a hmûrhai khawmin thil a suksuol nawh a.

Chuongchun, Job ruol pathum hai chun ama chunga thil ṭha naw tlunghai po po chu an lo hriet chun, an hmun senga inthawk chun an rêngin an hung seng a; Eliphaz Teman mi le, Bildad Suhi mi le Zophar Naamath mi an nih; ama chu thlamuon ding le tuorpui dinga hung dingin hun rem an ruot tlâng a.

Chuongchun, râl hlataka in- thawka an mithai an hei inlên chun, ama chu an hriet nawh a, an khêk rak rak a, an ṭap tâwl tah a; an puonhai chu an keithlêr tâwl a, pilvut vân- vawrin an luhai an inthêkhum a.
Chuongchun, ama kuoma chun hnuoi chungah ni sari le zân sari an ṭhung a, a tu khawm chun a kuomah iengkhawm an hril nawh a; a lung- ngaina chu a nasa êm êm a nih ti an hmu sih a.
